description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              •	Reporting to Finance Controller
              
              •	Based in Ho Chi Minh
              
              •	Prepare PL and cash flow forecasts and consolidate with PL and cash flows of other subsidiaries/affiliates (including monthly, quarterly and annual)
              
              •	Support to manage cash flows of group companies in VN practice
              
              •	Maintain a documented system of accounting policies and procedures.
              
              •	Manage the Company’s financial accounting, monitoring and reporting systems in compliant with all relevant Vietnam regulations as well as Group accounting policies
              
              •	Manage GLs, financial statements and reports to specific deadlines
              
              •	Checking and monitor all payment vouchers and receipt vouchers
              
              •	Manage processing time of bank payments
              
              •	Liaise with internal and external auditors to ensure effective audits for group companies in VN practice are carried out and deal with any irregular financial issues as they arise
              
              •	Working with the Taxation Dept, Statistics Dept, banks, auditors and other Vietnamese government authorities for all works relating to accounting and finance of the company
              
              •	Advise on and deal with tax issues to ensure compliance with tax legislation (including income tax, VAT, WHT, transfer pricing, etc)
              
              •	Identify, investigate, and analyze potential operational improvement. As appropriate, based on findings, make proposal for operational changes
              
              •	Proactively plan and execute training in financial policies, SOPs and systems
              
              •	Support for due diligence reviews
              
              •	Provide insightful financial and tax analysis
              
              •	Lead or contribute in other ad-hoc initiatives as assigned (e.g. develop and implement improvements to policies and procedures, systems, etc)
              
              •	Support members of other finance functions and/or counterparts in subsidiaries/affiliates across the entire country so as to ensure performance is of consistently high quality
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              •	Good degree in Accounting or equivalent from a reputable tertiary institution
              
              •	Minimum 8 years of relevant professional experience working for multinational commercial organization
              
              •	Proficient in English for work/business purposes
              
              •	Proficient in use of accounting and Enterprise Resource Software (ERP) systems
              
              •	Proficient in Microsoft Office tools such as MS Excel, Word and/or Powerpoint
              
              •	Experience with real estate sector and/or Big 4 / international audit firm is an advantage
              
              •	Proactive and results-driven
              
              •	Self-motivated to learn new concepts and participate in new projects
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
